column1: Baby won't you tell me why there is sadness in your eyes
column2: 宝贝，你真地不愿告诉我吗 为什么你的眼中含着伤悲？
column3: I don't wanna say goodbye to you
column5: Love is one big illusion I should try to forget
column6: 爱是场华丽错觉 我该尽力忘却
column7: but there is something left in my head
column8: 但有些事还留在我的脑海里，难以挥别
column9: You're the one who set it up now you're the one to make it stop
column10: 当初一切因你开始 现在一切因你终止
column11: I'm the one who's feeling lost right now
column12: 而此刻的我感到深深迷失
column13: Now you want me to forget every little thing you said
column15: but there is something left in my head
column17: Chorus:I won't forget the way you're kissing
column18: 我不会忘记你吻我的方式
column19: The feeling's so strong were lasting for so long
column20: 那些强烈的感情曾经延续了这么长的时间
column21: But I'm not the man your heart is missing
column22: 但我并不是那个你心中正在想念的人
column23: That's why you go away I know
column24: 我知道，那就是为何你选择离别
column25: You were never satisfied no matter how I tried
